description: Designed for runners looking for plush cushion, a wider fit and higher volume, the Jackal II GTX trail-running shoes keep your feet steady and stoked for long runs through rough, technical terrain in all conditions. The updated model maintains all the best aspects of the original Jackal GTX now with new eco-friendly upper materials, a new heel/tongue construction and enhanced breathability - all at a significant weight reduction from the first generation.
name: La Sportiva Jackal II GTX - Mens

specs.value: Ortholite® Hybrid with 5% recycled rubber + 15% production waste foam

specs.key: Updates From The Original Jackal GTX Include
specs.value: Use Of Recycled Mesh (Forefoot, Tongue & Lining), New Tongue Construction For Reduced Weight, Redesigned Heel With New Construction & Materials, New Lacing Design For A Higher Level Of Forefoot Volume Adaptability
